Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Interface ControllerInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
Controller
public interface ControllerInterface
Interface used by Lobby and the VirtualViews to interact with a match.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • join

      boolean join(ServerUpdateViewInterface view, String nickname)
      Joins a ServerUpdateViewInterface into the match. If the join is rejected, the client will be notified.
      Parameters:
      view - The ServerUpdateViewInterface performing the action.
      nickname - The nickname of the player performing the action.
      Returns:
      true iff the join completed successfully.

    • livingRoom

      void livingRoom(List<Position> positions, String nickname)
      Performs a selection from the LivingRoom. If the selection is rejected, the client will be notified.
      Parameters:
      positions - List of Positions that are chosen by the player.
      nickname - The nickname of the player performing the action.

    • bookshelf

      void bookshelf(int column, List<Integer> permutation, String nickname)
      Performs an insertion in the player's Bookshelf. If the insertion is rejected, the client will be notified.
      Parameters:
      column - The column of the Bookshelf where to insert the previously chosen Items
      permutation - List of Integers representing the order in which to insert the Items in the Bookshelf.
      nickname - The nickname of the player performing the action.

    • chat

      void chat(String text, String receiver, String nickname)
      Processes a chat message from a player. If the message is rejected, the client will be notified.
      Parameters:
      text - The content of the message.
      receiver - The receiver of the message.
      nickname - The nickname of the player performing the action.

    • disconnection

      void disconnection(String nickname)
      Processes a disconnection of a client.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player performing the action.

    • reconnection

      boolean reconnection(ServerUpdateViewInterface view, String nickname)
      Processes a reconnection of a previously disconnected player.
      Parameters:
      view - The view of the player reconnecting.
      nickname - The nickname of the client reconnecting.
      Returns:
      true iff the reconnection went fine.

    • isStarted

      boolean isStarted()
      Returns whether the game has started.
      Returns:
      true iff the game has already started.

    • getNumberPlayers

      int getNumberPlayers()
      Getter for the number of players.
      Returns:
      The number of players.

    • getNumberCommonGoalCards

      int getNumberCommonGoalCards()
      Getter for the number of common goal cards.
      Returns:
      The number of common goal cards.

    • isEnded

      boolean isEnded()
      Returns whether the game has ended.
      Returns:
      true iff the game has ended.
